title: Shotaro Onishi
text: is a former <a href="Japanese%20people">Japanese</a> <a href="Rugby%20Union">rugby union</a> player who played as a <a href="Centre%20%28rugby%20union%29">centre</a>. He spent his whole career playing for both <a href="Kintetsu%20Liners">Kintetsu Liners</a> and <a href="Toyota%20Industries%20Shuttles">Toyota Industries Shuttles</a> in Japan's domestic <a href="Top%20League">Top League</a>, playing over 560 times. He was named in the <a href="Japan%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Japan</a> squad for the <a href="2007%20Rugby%20World%20Cup">2007 Rugby World Cup</a>, making 3 appearances in the tournament. He made a further 30 appearances for Japan in his career, scoring 71 points.
